name: Beef Manhattan
description: is a dish consisting of roast beef and gravy.

name: Cheese steak
description: is a sandwich made from thinly sliced pieces of beefsteak and melted cheese in a long hoagie roll.

name: Beef Wellington
description: is an English pie made of fillet steak coated with pâté (often pâté de foie gras) and duxelles.

name: Bistek
description: is a Spanish loan word derived from the English words.beef steak abbreviated.

name: Beef steak
description: often called just steak, is a flat cut of beef with parallel faces.

name: Bulgogi
description: rom Korean bul-gogi [pul.ɡo.ɡi]), literally fire meat, is a gui (구이; Korean-style grilled or roasted dish) made of thin.

name: Carpetbag steak
description: is a traditional working class dish from Mumbles.

name: Carne asada
description: is a dish of grilled and sliced beef, usually skirt steak, sirloin steak, tenderloin steak, or rib steak.
